Hi, my
name is Elias.

  • About Me

    I’m Elias, a software engineer passionate about building scalable systems and creating intuitive solutions to everyday problems. I'm a rising junior at Santa Clara University studying Computer Science & Engineering and previously was a software development intern at The Hivery in Mill Valley, CA.


    On campus and beyond, I’ve been passionate about creating spaces that help others grow in technology. I’ve mentored peers in computer science courses, sharing insights on systems programming and data structures, and extended that impact by creating a YouTube channel dedicated to teaching programming concepts. I also use LinkedIn as a platform to share lessons learned and advice for students entering the field, building on years of tutoring and mentoring experience.


    I’ve gained hands-on experience through internships, hackathons, and collaborations where I worked on building scalable backend systems, optimizing algorithms and queries, and developing fullstack applications.

    Collaboration & Experience

    Software Development Intern

    The Hivery Mill Valley, CA July 2025 - Sept. 2025 Internship

    During my internship at The Hivery, I designed and implemented automation solutions that streamlined operations and improved digital visibility. I built Python and Google Apps Script pipelines to clean, transform, and merge external datasets, reducing reporting time by 66%. I also automated the company’s scheduling system by integrating Zapier with REST APIs (Calendly, Kajabi, CRM), which eliminated 80% of event conflicts and improved front-desk efficiency. In addition, I spearheaded a comprehensive SEO audit, developing a keyword-driven optimization strategy that boosted organic traffic by 39% in just three weeks. This project highlights my ability to combine software engineering, automation, and data-driven problem solving to deliver immediate business impact.

    Python Flask MySQL AWS
